mapper.insert: insert into hotplace(admin_id, id, title, pictures, zipcode, address, address_detail, region, description, tags, postdate) values(#{admin_id}, default, #{title}, #{pictures}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{region}, #{description}, #{tags}, now())
mapper.update: update hotplace set admin_id=#{admin_id}, title=#{title}, pictures=#{pictures}, region=#{region}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, address=#{address}, address_detail=#{address_detail}, description=#{description}, tags=#{tags}, lastupdate=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from hotplace order by id desc;
select * from hotplace where id IN(select scrap_id from helper_hotplace where scrap_email=#{userID});
mapper.delete: delete from helper_hotplace where scrap_id=#{scrap_id} AND scrap_email=#{scrap_email};
mapper.select: select * from hotplace where region like CONCAT('%',#{value},'%');
